models.detection

Class TargetGatherEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Event
      • models.detection.TargetGatherEvent

  • public class TargetGatherEvent
extends Event
    An Event subclass that performs the Janus target gather function.

    • Method Detail

      • doEvent

        public Event doEvent()
        The method to execute processing of a target gather event.
        Overrides:
        doEvent in class Event
        Returns:
        Return a reference to an event object. The assumption is that if a valid event is returned, it will be reinserted back into an event queue. If a null is returned,nothing will be added to the queue.

      • targetGather

        private void targetGather()
        Perform the target gather process.

      • listPreviousDetections

        private java.util.Vector<EntityDetection> listPreviousDetections(Sensor sensor)
        Get the list of currently detected entities to ensure they make it into the final target list.
        Parameters:
        sensor - The observer's sensor.
        Returns:
        A list of currently detected entities.

      • listTargets

        private SortedList listTargets(ObserverEntity observer,
                               double vismax,
                               Sensor sensor)
        Search all targets within range and sort them by weighted priority.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer entity.
        vismax - The maximum range within which to include targets.
        sensor - The observer's sensor.
        Returns:
        A sorted list of potential targets.

      • testTarget

        private double testTarget(ObserverEntity observer,
                          double xmin,
                          double xmax,
                          double ymin,
                          double ymax,
                          DetectedEntity target,
                          Sensor sensor)
        Get the weighted priority for this target, so it can be sorted.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observing entity.
        xmin - The minimum x value within which a target can be detected.
        xmax - The maximum x value within which a target can be detected.
        ymin - The minimum y value within which a target can be detected.
        ymax - The maximum y value within which a target can be detected.
        target - The target to assess.
        sensor - The sensor used by the observer.
        Returns:
        The weighted priority for this target or -1 if it is not to be included.

      • addTargets

        private void addTargets(SortedList sortedList,
                        java.util.Vector<EntityDetection> previousList)
        Combine the list of previous targets with the list of new targets sorted by weighted priority into one list and save that as the new entity target list.
        Parameters:
        sortedList - The list of new targets.
        previousList - The list of old targets.
